ai-patthana15.85:0.2_0: The Order of the Dhamma: allows unintelligent in the Khadehaka, that is to say, the Lord of the Death,
ai-patthana15.85:0.3_0: wrapped in what is the path, and so on.
ai-patthana15.85:1.1_0: Relying on the path, does not give rise to the anus or the vagina.
ai-patthana15.85:2.1_0: Without causes and reasons, without cause or condition.
ai-patthana15.85:3.1_0: ‘This path does not give rise to the refuge. Nor do you have no cause or condition.
